name: Matching Card Pairs
description:
Matching Card Pairs is a fun and addictive puzzle game. Try to match pairs in as little moves as possible or you can flip the cards quickly and race against the clock to beat your old best times.

Features
* nice background music
* cool graphics
* simple one touch controls
* different levels of difficulty

Enjoy fun gameplay and improve your concentration skills with this classic card game. Matching Card Pairs is a great game for any age.
